Relations Ontology

Relationship types shared across multiple ontologies

ID Space
ro
PURL
http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/ro.owl
License
CC-BY
Homepage
https://github.com/oborel/obo-relations/
Contact
Chris Mungall
Trackers
https://github.com/oborel/obo-relations/issues
Domain
relations
Jobs
DryRunBuild

Summary

RO is a collection of relations intended primarily for standardization across ontologies in the OBO Foundry and wider OBO library. It incorporates ROCore upper-level relations such as part of as well as biology-specific relationship types such as develops from.

See the site Menu for more info

Download

Use the following URIs to download this ontology:

  • http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/ro.owl
  • http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/ro.obo

Note that the source ontology is OWL - the OBO version may have less axioms. Another difference between the two formats is that the OWL makes use of imports, whereas everything is combined into one with the obo file.

Products

ro.owl Relation Ontology
ro.obo Relation Ontology in obo format
ro/core.owl Core relations Minimal subset intended to work with BFO-classes
ro/subsets/ro-interaction.owl Interaction relations
ro/subsets/ro-eco.owl Ecology subset
ro/subsets/ro-neuro.owl Neuroscience subset
